\SetAPI{J-C}
\section{audit.reason.required.default}
\label{configuration:AuditReasonRequiredDefault}
\ClearAPI
Defines whether by default an audit reason is required or not. If no \type{AuditReasonRequired} annotation is added to the entity / member this property defines whether a reason is necessary. Valid values are "true" and "false".

%% GENERATED USAGE REFERENCE END
\begin{lstlisting}[style=Props,caption={Usage example for \textit{audit.reason.required.default}}]
audit.reason.required.default=false
\end{lstlisting}
